list.noResultsFound:
**Functional Purpose**: Message displayed when no tracks match the current search or filters.
**UI Location**: Student Tracks List (empty state).
**When Users See This**: After applying search/filters that yield no results.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "No results found"
list.resetSearchAndFilters:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to clear search queries and applied filters.
**UI Location**: Student Tracks List (empty state).
**When Users See This**: When no results are found, offering a way to reset the view.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Reset search and filters"
